name: Asteroid Runner (samonegames)
description:
Hello,
We have published a game as our first game as 2 friends. We think the game is fun and we want to keep improving it. Our development plans are given in the following list;

  1. Leaderboard system
  2. Special abilities on Planets
  3. New challenges and levels
  4. New designs and new planets
  5. Publishing on iOS

While developing our game, we need many additional financial resources, and as individual developers, these financial resources are pushing us. What we see as the most important goal is to be able to publish the game on the iOS platform. That's why we need economic resources.

We continue to develop other game ideas, you can donate to support us.
